snippet.title: OneShot: Aftermath - Official Teaser
snippet.description:
OneShot: Aftermath is a fan-made sequel to the surreal Puzzle/Adventure game “OneShot”. One year after the events of Solstice, you and Niko find yourselves returning to this world. There will be consequences. Do you wish to proceed?

* Wishlist the game here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1601980/OneShot_Aftermath/
https://eternabyte.itch.io/oneshot-aftermath
─────────────────────────────────────────────
Music - Taryvision ( https://taryvision.bandcamp.com )
Animation and Editing - Cryro ( https://twitter.com/CryroFox )
Concept and Design - DJ Robot ( https://twitter.com/_DjRobot ) & Hazel ( https://twitter.com/HazelRoseraie )
─────────────────────────────────────────────
A short OneShot: Aftermath FAQ!:

Q - "Will OSAM be available on platforms other than Steam or PC?"
A - "We will not be leaving PC, however there is talk of a DRM free build underway!"

Q - "Will OSAM be available in different languages?"
A - "Yes! We hope to release the game with Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese translations currently, however there is a chance we won't have time upon release due to the size of our team. We do hope to have our game as culturally accessible as possible however, it just might take a bit of time!

Q - "What happened to the old Gamejolt download, and will it ever become public again?"
A - "Gamejolt's ToS states that a game released on Steam and other major platforms cannot be on theirs. Due to this, we have made it private (though not deleted for archival reasons)."

Q - "Is this official?"
A - "No, this is a fan project."

Q - "You can't release fangames on Steam without permission from the devs/publisher!"
A - "Correct! That's why we got full permission from the original OneShot devs and Degica Games!"

Q - "Is this related to Fading Memory?"
A - "No, not at all. As much as we're friends with Astrabit (the devs of Fading Memory), our games take place in completely different universes and timelines."

Q - "When do you plan on releasing OSAM?"
A - "Frankly, when it's done. However, we do have our eyes set towards late 2022, and a public demo in mid February."

Q - "Will the game be free?"
A - "As long as you own an original copy of OneShot, it'll be free to download!"

Q - "What are the Eternabyte cores?"
REALLY COOL ANSWER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! - Soon you will LLSee! :D
─────────────────────────────────────────────
* Support us on Patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/Eternabyte
* Our website:
https://eternabyte.dev/
* Listen to the soundtrack here:
https://music.eternabyte.dev./
* Join the official Eternabyte Discord server:
https://discord.gg/pvSEcbCbn9
* Follow us on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/EternabyteDev
* Follow our Tumblr/Devlog:
https://eternabyte.tumblr.com/




#OneShotAftermath #OneShotGame #OSAM #OneShot
